scroll_drag_click: Scroll, Drag or Click to Navigate
productivity_tagline: The most powerful way to maximize productivity.

vesslo.title: Vesslo
vesslo.description: The ultimate update manager for macOS. Unified tracking for App Store, Homebrew, and more.
vesslo.desc_short: The ultimate app management solution for Mac

keyharbor.title: KeyHarbor
keyharbor.description: Drag & drop to auto-extract app info. Secured locally with Touch ID.

harbor.title: All Keys, One Harbor
harbor.desc: Securely manage all your scattered license keys in one place with KeyHarbor. No more digging through emails or searching for notes.

security.title: Military-Grade Encryption
security.desc: All license keys are securely stored locally with AES-256 encryption. No cloud sync‚Äîonly you have access.

alert.title: Smart Expiration Alerts
alert.desc: Get notified automatically when subscriptions are about to expire. Never miss an important license. Track renewal costs at a glance.

splitswipe.title: SplitSwipe
splitswipe.description: Snap, split, and manage your windows with intuitive gestures and shortcuts.

split.title: Redefining Window Splitting
split.desc: Split windows perfectly with intuitive swipe gestures. Manage your screen like a pro without complex shortcuts.

snap.title: Snap Grid System
snap.desc: Drag windows to corners and they snap automatically. Set up 2-way splits, 4-way splits, or custom layouts freely.

keyboard.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard.desc: Complete keyboard shortcuts for power users. Manage all windows instantly without a mouse.

harbordrop.title: HarborDrop
harbordrop.description: The IDM (Internet Download Manager) for Mac ‚Äî accelerated downloads, HLS streams, and auto-organization.
harbordrop.desc_short: IDM for Mac ‚Äî Smart Download Manager

hero.title: Peace of a Perfectly Organized Mac
hero.desc:
Vesslo isn't just an update manager.
It's a premium command center completing your Mac lifestyle.

Design.title: Crystal Aurora Design
Design.subtitle: Crystal Aurora Design
Design.desc: Abandon the prejudice that utility apps must be ugly. Vesslo applies the Crystal Aurora design language, offering glowing borders, soft glassmorphism, and lively gradient animations. Just keeping it open makes your Mac more luxurious.

Unified.title: Peace of Unified Management
Unified.subtitle: Unified Management
Unified.desc: Don't open the terminal, App Store, and websites for updates. Manage updates from Homebrew, Sparkle, and App Store all in one screen.

Memory.title: Perfect Memory & Records
Memory.subtitle: Memory & Tags
Memory.desc: Even if you delete an app, your notes and tags remain. Vesslo answers questions like 'What was the name of that program?' or 'Why did I delete it when I tried it last year?'. Manage apps with your own tags like Work, Subscribed, Video Editing.

Convertible.title: Brew Convertible
Convertible.subtitle: Smart Transition
Convertible.desc: Have apps downloaded directly from the internet? Vesslo automatically detects them and converts them to Homebrew management mode with a single click. Switch to Homebrew intelligently.

Raycast.title: Raycast Extension Integration
Raycast.subtitle: Faster Workflow
Raycast.desc: Manage all app info without opening a mouse, just with a keyboard. From app search to bulk updates, experience Vesslo's powerful features inside Raycast.

cta.title: Don't Just Manage, Own It.
cta.desc:
With Vesslo, app management is no longer a chore.
Control your Mac in the most beautiful way.

overview.title: 1. Service Overview
overview.content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the software products and related services (including Vesslo, KeyHarbor, SplitSwipe, HarborDrop and any other products, collectively the "Service") provided by mani's tech (the "Company").

payment.title: 2. Payment and Sales
payment.content: Payments are processed by Paddle.com, which acts as the Merchant of Record for all orders. Paddle handles payment processing, invoicing, sales tax/VAT, and refunds for purchases of the Service.
items: All prices are displayed in local currency and may include applicable VAT or sales tax.
For payment inquiries, please contact Paddle customer support.

license.title: 3. License Grant
license.content: Upon payment completion and subject to your continued compliance with these Terms, the Company grants users a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to:
items: Use the software for personal or commercial purposes
Install and use within the number of devices specified in the license
Receive free updates (during the license period for the applicable version)

restrictions.title: 4. Usage Restrictions
items: Copy, modify, distribute, or sell the software
Attempt reverse engineering, decompilation, or source code extraction
Share or resell license keys
Circumvent security mechanisms of the service

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
ip.content: All intellectual property rights in the software and related content belong to the Company. The license is a grant of usage rights, not a transfer of ownership.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The software is provided 'as is', and the Company is not liable for:
items: Data loss or corruption
Indirect or incidental damages from software use
Compatibility issues with third-party services

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: The Company may change these terms as needed, and significant changes will be notified through the website or email.

law.title: 8. Governing Law
law.content: These terms are interpreted under the laws of the Republic of Korea, and related disputes are subject to the jurisdiction of Seoul Central District Court.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For inquiries about these terms, please contact me@hjm79.top.
contact.see_also: See also our Privacy Policy and Refund Policy.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: mani's tech (hereinafter 'Company') takes user privacy protection seriously. This Privacy Policy explains the information collected and how it is processed when using our software (Vesslo, KeyHarbor, SplitSwipe, HarborDrop) and website.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.payment_content: Payments are processed through Paddle.com. The Company does not directly collect or store payment card information.
license_items: Email address (for license issuance and support)
collection.app_content: Our apps do not upload data to the cloud. All data is stored locally on the user's device.

usage.title: 3. Purpose of Information Use
usage.content: Collected information is used only for the following purposes:
items: Software license activation and management
Customer support provision
Product update notifications (with consent)
Service improvement (anonymous analytics data only)

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.content: The Company does not sell user personal information to third parties.

security.title: 5. Data Security
items: SSL/TLS encrypted communication
KeyHarbor: AES-256 encryption for stored license keys
Vesslo: Non-sensitive app metadata stored locally only
SplitSwipe: Window preferences stored locally, no sensitive data
HarborDrop: Download history and settings stored locally, no sensitive data
Regular security reviews

rights.title: 6. User Rights
items: Request to view, modify, or delete personal information
Opt-out of marketing communications
Opt-out of anonymous analytics data collection

gdpr.title: 7. GDPR (European Users)
gdpr.content: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to rectification of inaccurate data
Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
Right to restrict processing
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing

ccpa.title: 8. CCPA (California Residents)
ccpa.content: If you are a California resident, you have the following rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA):
items: Right to know what personal information is collected
Right to delete your personal information
Right to opt-out of sale of personal information (We do not sell your data)
Right to non-discrimination for exercising your rights

cookies.title: 9. Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses minimal cookies for essential functionality only. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact me@hjm79.top.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.guarantee_desc: mani's tech offers a 14-day money-back guarantee for all software products purchased through Paddle.com. Within 14 days of purchase, you may request a full refund for any reason by contacting Paddle directly through your purchase confirmation email receipt link.
refund.trial_tip_desc: We recommend trying our free trial before purchase to ensure the software meets your needs.
refund.payment_info_desc: All refunds are processed exclusively by Paddle.com, our Merchant of Record.
refund.method1_desc: Request a refund through the Paddle receipt link in your purchase confirmation email.
timeline_items: Paddle will confirm receipt of your refund request within 1-2 business days
Paddle will process approved refunds within 5-10 business days
Refund timing to your payment method may vary
refund.contact_note: Refund requests must be submitted through Paddle. For other support questions, email me@hjm79.top.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: If you have questions or feedback, please reach out.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Inquiry Type
contact.success_desc: Thank you for your message. We will respond as soon as possible.
contact.quick_help_desc: Payment or refund inquiries can also be handled through Paddle customer support.

footer.paddle_notice: Paddle.com is our official Merchant of Record.

homepage.our_apps_desc: Transform your Mac experience with three powerful tools.
homepage.strong_security_desc: All data is stored locally. No cloud uploads‚Äîonly you have access.
homepage.native_speed_desc: Pure macOS apps built with Swift. Experience true native performance without Electron.
homepage.beautiful_design_desc: Respecting macOS design language while adding unique aesthetics.
homepage.free_trial_desc: All apps offer free trials. Experience them without commitment.

detail_page.tagline: The most powerful way to maximize productivity.

scan.feature1_desc: Automatically finds updates for your installed apps
scan.feature2_desc: Homebrew, Sparkle, and App Store unified
scan.feature3_desc: Check updates and search app content (memo, tag)

pricing_page.title: Simple, One-Time Pricing
pricing_page.subtitle: No subscriptions. Pay once, use forever.
pricing_page.paddle_notice: All payments are securely processed by Paddle.com, our official Merchant of Record.

vesslo.description: The ultimate update manager for macOS

items.a: Yes! Pay once for the current version. No subscriptions or recurring charges. Minor updates are included free.

items.q: How many devices can I use?
items.a: All apps come with a single-device license. If you need additional devices, please purchase a separate license.
All payments are processed securely through Paddle. Credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay are accepted.
Yes! All apps offer a free trial period so you can test before purchasing.
We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.

features.title: All Keys, One Harbor
features.desc: Securely manage all your scattered license keys in one place. No more digging through emails or searching for notes.

features.title: Your Data, Your Device
features.desc: All data is stored locally on your Mac‚Äînever synced to the cloud. Protected by Touch ID and your master password.

features.title: Smart Expiration Alerts
features.desc: Get notified automatically when subscriptions are about to expire. Never miss an important license renewal.

features.title: 2-Split & 3-Split Layouts
features.desc: Easily arrange your windows in 2-split (1|2) or 3-split (1|2|3) horizontal layouts. Perfect for multitasking.

features.title: App Rotation
features.desc: Rotate assigned apps within each zone using keyboard shortcuts or trackpad gestures via BetterTouchTool.

features.title: Keyboard & Gesture Support
features.desc: Control everything with keyboard shortcuts or trackpad gestures. No mouse required for power users.

splitswipe_page.video_desc: The arrows in the video demonstrate how apps rotate using keyboard shortcuts or trackpad gestures. Easily switch between assigned apps in 2-split (1|2) or 3-split (1|2|3) layouts.
splitswipe_page.video_3split_desc: Windows highlighted in red indicate apps with size restrictions or excluded apps.
splitswipe_page.showcase_split_desc: Divide your screen into 2 or 3 zones for efficient multitasking. Assign and switch apps in each zone as needed.
splitswipe_page.showcase_keyboard_desc: Quickly split windows and rotate apps with keyboard shortcuts. Perfect window management without a mouse.
splitswipe_page.showcase_overview_desc: Overview mode lets you see at a glance which apps are assigned to each zone.
splitswipe_page.cta_desc: Download for free and start experiencing the new way of window management.

harbordrop_page.tagline: IDM for Mac ‚Äî Smart Download Manager
harbordrop_page.in_action_body: Like IDM (Internet Download Manager) on Windows, HarborDrop brings segmented acceleration, stable resume, and clear status tracking to macOS ‚Äî making large file downloads fast and reliable.

features.title: Speed by Segments
features.desc: Use multiple connections per file to better utilize available bandwidth.

features.title: Extension Capture Modes
features.desc: Capture downloads from browser extension via Media, All Links, and in-page buttons.

features.title: Category Rules + Actions
features.desc: Apply domain and filename rules, then run post-download actions automatically.

showcase.title: Browser to App Capture
showcase.desc: Send downloadable links from browser extension to HarborDrop instantly (Media / All Links / in-page).

showcase.title: Domain + Filename Rules
showcase.desc: Classify by domain and apply filename rules to keep your library consistent.

showcase.title: Post-Download Actions
showcase.desc: Run Finder reveal, rename scripts, and custom shell/JS actions after completion.

showcase.title: HLS-Ready Video Flow
showcase.desc: Detect m3u8 streams and handle quality-aware download workflow.

harbordrop_page.cta_body: Move from basic downloading to an organized, automation-ready workflow on macOS.

docs.hero_subtitle: The new standard for macOS app management
docs.tagline: Vesslo ‚Äî The new standard for Mac app management ‚ú®

intro.desc_pre: Vesslo is an app manager that lets you
intro.feat_unified_desc: Update Homebrew, Sparkle, and App Store apps from a single screen
intro.feat_sort_desc: Auto-sort by category, tag, or source
intro.feat_running_desc: Safely quit running apps before updating

layout.panel23_desc: Area for displaying app list and details. Layout changes based on view mode.

views.list_view_desc: Apps displayed in single rows vertically

individual_steps: Select the desired app from the list
batch_steps: Click the 'Update All' button in the top right
Password-required apps: Click 'Open Terminal' in orange section ‚Üí enter password ‚Üí 'Confirm Done'
App Store apps: Click 'Open Terminal' in blue section ‚Üí run mas upgrade ‚Üí 'Confirm Done'
category_steps: Select desired category in sidebar (e.g., Developer Tools)
Only apps in that category are updated
update.category_tip: Useful when you want to update only a specific category!
update.individual_intro: The update button label and behavior change depending on the app's source:

btn_table.label: Update (Menu)
btn_table.action: Choose mas upgrade or open App Store

btn_table.label: Adopt & Update üü†
btn_table.action: Converts to Homebrew via brew install --cask --adopt + update

btn_table.label: Update (Options)
btn_table.action: Default Sparkle update, Adopt & Update optional

btn_table.label: Open App
btn_table.action: Launch app to check for updates manually

running.title: Running App Handling Settings
running.path: Settings ‚Üí Updates ‚Üí Running app handling during full update
running.safe_desc: Shows confirmation popup before quitting, gives app a chance to show save dialog
running.force_desc: Quits immediately without confirmation (unsaved data may be lost)

sources.desc: Vesslo detects updates from various sources:
sources.setapp_desc: Requires updating directly from Setapp app
sources.badge_desc: Badges displayed next to app names provide additional info:
sources.badge_manual: Manual install app ‚Äî brew upgrade not possible, uses brew fetch + installer
sources.badge_ios: iOS/iPadOS app (runs on Apple Silicon Mac)

manual.title: Manual Install (Installer Manual) Apps
manual.how1: A üì¶ orange box icon appears next to the app name
individual_steps: Click the copy button next to the command in the app detail page banner
Run the downloaded PKG file from Finder to complete installation
batch_steps: Manual install apps are automatically sorted into the terminal section
Click 'Open Terminal' to download via brew fetch and auto-launch installer
Complete installation when PKG/DMG file opens
manual.tip_manual: but manual install apps require downloading via
manual.tip_suffix: and manually running the PKG/DMG. Existing app data and plugins are preserved.

adoptable.desc: Adoptable apps have a Homebrew cask available but were not installed via brew. For example: Firefox, XnViewMP downloaded directly from the official website.
adoptable.example_list: Firefox, XnViewMP, etc. downloaded from official sites
adoptable.how1: A üîÑüì¶ orange conversion icon appears next to the app name
adoptable.how2: Appears in the "Convertible" section on the updates screen
adoptable.how3: Detail page shows an "Adopt to Homebrew" button
adopt_steps: Click 'Adopt & Update' üü† from the detail/list/grid/table update button
Review warnings in the pre-conversion confirmation popup and proceed
Existing app is registered under Homebrew management without deletion
On success, source changes from Manual ‚Üí Homebrew automatically
From now on, the app is an auto-update target in batch (Update All)
adoptable.sparkle_tip: Adoptable apps with a Sparkle source can use Sparkle updates first. Only use Adopt & Update when you want to switch to Homebrew management.
adoptable.preflight3: App is not currently running (must quit first)
adoptable.preflight4: Cask characteristics warnings (auto_updates, uninstall delete, possible password requirement)

caution_table.desc: Safe ‚Äî registers existing app without deleting it
Some casks delete and reinstall during brew upgrade, which may reset app settings
Running brew uninstall after adopt will DELETE the app. There is no 'unregister only' command
Only apps in /Applications or ~/Applications can be adopted

adoptable.caution_tip: Most apps are safely adopted. Back up settings for important apps before proceeding.
adoptable.batch1: Adoptable apps are skipped as 'requires manual update' in batch (Update All)
adoptable.batch2: After running 'Adopt & Update' once individually, the app becomes an auto-update target in batch

manage.uninstall_desc: Click 'Uninstall App' in the detail view to open the uninstall sheet, review associated files, and move selected items to Trash.
manage.uninstall_scan: For regular apps, choose between Standard Scan (user area only) or Deep Clean Scan (includes system /Library).
manage.uninstall_running: Running apps will be auto-terminated before uninstall. If termination fails, the uninstall is cancelled.
manage.uninstall_homebrew: Homebrew-installed apps are removed via brew uninstall --cask (option: --zap).
manage.uninstall_report: Results show success or partial failure, and execution logs are saved to ~/Library/Application Support/Vesslo/UninstallReports/.
manage.skip_version_desc: Ignore only a specific version (next version will notify)
manage.skip_app_desc: Ignore all updates for this app
manage.tag_filter: Filter and search apps by tag
manage.memo_license: Record license keys, settings info, etc.

search.search_name: Search by app name in the top search bar

items: ‚åò + R
Refresh app list
‚åò + ,
Open Settings
‚åò + F
Search

faq.a1_step2: Check if the source is enabled in Settings
faq.a1_step3: Check if the app is in "Ignored" state
faq.a2_desc: Homebrew apps requiring a password or manual installation run in Terminal.
faq.a3_desc1: type Homebrew Cask. These apps cannot be auto-updated via
faq.a3_desc3: and the installer is run manually.
faq.a4_mas_post: CLI must be installed. Check installation guide in Settings.
faq.a4_password_post: requires a password, so it runs in Terminal.
faq.a4_batch: During batch updates, App Store apps appear in the blue section ‚Äî use "Open Terminal" to batch update.
faq.a5_desc: An app where a Homebrew cask mapping exists but was installed via a different path (official website, DMG, etc.), not through brew. Click 'Adopt & Update' to register it under Homebrew management, enabling automatic updates going forward. See the Adoptable Apps section above for details.
faq.a6_path: Check if the app is installed in /Applications or ~/Applications
faq.a6_running: Quit the app if it's running, then try again
faq.a6_cask: The cask name may differ from the actual app ‚Äî select the correct cask from the 'Adopt to Homebrew' sheet on the detail page
faq.q7: Why are Convertible apps skipped in 'Update All'?
faq.a7_desc: Adoptable app conversion requires user confirmation, so it doesn't run automatically in batch. Once you run 'Adopt & Update' individually, the app becomes an automatic batch update target like regular Homebrew apps.

raycast.desc_pre: Use Vesslo's core features directly from
install_steps: Search 'Vesslo' in Raycast Store or install directly
Vesslo app must be installed on your Mac
raycast.install_step1: Search 'Vesslo' in Raycast Store or click the button below
raycast.install_step2: Vesslo app must be installed on your Mac

commands.name: Search Apps
commands.desc: Search apps by name, developer, tag, or memo

commands.name: View Updates
commands.desc: Check updatable apps (Homebrew, Sparkle, App Store)

usage_steps: Type a command like Search Apps, View Updates, etc.
Select an app and use Action Panel (‚åò + K) for more actions
raycast.tip: The Raycast extension syncs data from the Vesslo app in real time. Scan or update in Vesslo, and it's instantly reflected in Raycast.
